critique: The executive order seems to be a revocation of a previous order, which might convey a sense of sadness or disappointment to those who benefited from the previous order. However, it could also convey a sense of joy or relief to those who were negatively affected by the previous order. On the other hand, the order could also convey a sense of surprise to those who were not expecting the revocation. Overall, the order seems to be more neutral than emotional, so I will score the emotions accordingly.
